Title: Enacts the public benefits privacy act
Summary: Provides privacy protections for public benefits recipients regarding disclosure or inquiry about immigration status and eligibility; provides penalties for employees of state or local agencies that knowingly violate such provisions; directs OTDA to promulgate rules and regulations and submit an annual report regarding compliance with, and complaints regarding, violations of such provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง136-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the "public benefits privacy act"
